newsitem.title: USA: Dura Pharm files for $200 mln debt offer.
newsitem.headline: Dura Pharm files for $200 mln debt offer.

text.p: Dura Pharmaceuticals Inc said Tuesday it had filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission for a public offering of up to $200 million in convertible subordinated notes due 2002.
The offering will be made through Merrill Lynch & Co and Goldman, Sachs & Co as co-managers. Underwriters have a 30-day over-allotment option on an additional $30 million of the notes.
Dura makes prescription drugs for the treatment of allergies, asthma and related respiratory conditions.
